alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 30 at 12:01AM CDT until July 30 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Cimarron River at Kenton 2NE affecting Cimarron County. For the Cimarron River...including Kenton 2NE...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cimarron River at Kenton 2NE. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.0 feet early this morning. - Action stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued at 4am.this afternoon at 1215 PM CDT.
